Name: Nova Odessa - The Strange Tower
About the game: You are a demon hunter. That's your job. What do you say when your boss asks you to kill demons in a haunted tower? You say yes . You've done this countless times, killing demons isn't something new. But this tower is different . Your boss is uneasy, she regrets telling you about this tower. She says you don't need to go. It's too late now. You always say yes , even when you really want to say no . You go to the tower, takes the first step in. Everything goes dark. You don't know what happened. You don't know where you are. All you know is that you will get out of the tower. Features Fast-paced combat Randomly generated levels Two different game modes: Classic and Survival 80 items 5 melee weapons 10 ranged weapons 14 bosses
